metadata.title: CVE-2019-12300 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Buildbot before 1.8.2 and 2.x before 2.3.1 accepts a user-submitted authorization token from OAuth and uses it to authenticate a user. If an attacker has a token allowing them to read the user details of a victim, they can login as the victim.

criterions.comment: buildbot package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.1-1').
